name: Gal*Gun
description:
• Shot by an angel's arrow, for the next twenty four hours, you'll be brimming with attraction. As the coolest guy in the vicinity, you suddenly find yourself in the radar of the four most popular girls in school. However, there is one catch, if you are not able to find a girlfriend by the end of the day, you'll be stuck as the guy-without-a-girlfriend for the rest of your life.
  • Charge up your pheromone shots and aim it at THE GIRL. Each of them has their soft spots, shoot at it and gather information on them. Since you are so popular, girls (up to 70 of them) may horde over you and become obstacles, so aim it right. You don't want her to dump you before you win her heart.
  • A shooter full of raging hormones, the game is fully voiced, comes with ample amount of game modes that reveal sides of the girls. It will surely satisfy the fantasies of all shooters and bishojo lovers.
